seo: citrix,漏洞检测,CVE-2020-8191,CVE-2019-19781,CVE-2020-8209,目录遍历,任意文件读取,XSS
summary: 该插件用于检测Citrix应用中的多个漏洞，包括CVE-2020-8191 XSS漏洞、CVE-2019-19781目录遍历漏洞以及CVE-2020-8209任意文件读取漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect multiple vulnerabilities in Citrix applications, including CVE-2020-8191 XSS vulnerability, CVE-2019-19781 directory traversal vulnerability, and CVE-2020-8209 arbitrary file read vulnerability.
